quote: If we do not know ourselves to be full of pride, ambition, lust, weakness, misery, and injustice, we are indeed blind. And if, knowing this, we do not desire deliverance, what can we say of a man...?
quote_letters: IF WE DO NOT KNOW OURSELVES TO BE FULL OF PRIDE AMBITION LUST WEAKNESS MISERY AND INJUSTICE WE ARE INDEED BLIND AND IF KNOWING THIS WE DO NOT DESIRE DELIVERANCE WHAT CAN WE SAY OF A MAN
